projects.title: Poor Man's Rekognition
projects.subtitle: Open source alternative to AWS Rekognition
projects.description: Built an open-source alternative to Amazon's Rekognition service during Google Summer of Code. Scene text detection with TextBoxes++, text recognition with CRNN, scene classification with EfficientNet B7, object detection with YOLOv3, and face detection with RetinaFace. All models served via TensorFlow Serving with Django REST APIs.
projects.tech_stack: Python, TensorFlow, TensorFlow Serving, Django, Docker, Travis CI
key_achievements: CRNN trained on synth90k for text recognition
Full REST API with Docker deployment

projects.title: Real-time 3D Avatar Generation
projects.subtitle: Generating 3D Hikemoji from human faces in the browser
projects.description: Built real-time 3D avatar generation system at Hike Messenger. Used TensorFlow.js and Facemesh to generate 3D head mesh, Position Map Regression for texture processing, BiSeNet for face segmentation, and BabylonJS for rendering. Runs entirely in browser with custom asset support.

blog_posts.description: What happens when you point a neural network at cricket footage with no labels. Generating training data from thin air, teaching SlowFast to see batting strokes, and the surprising gap between model accuracy and what actually matters.
